original_text: So what help will you get from Egypt? If you drink water from the Nile river, will that make you strong? No! And what help will you get from Assyria? If you drink water from the Euphrates river, will that make you strong? No! So what help will you get from Egypt? If you drink water from the Nile river, will that make you strong? No! And what help will you get from Assyria? If you drink water from the Euphrates river, will that make you strong? No! So what help will you get from Egypt? If you drink water from the Nile river, will that make you strong? No! And what help will you get from Assyria? If you drink water from the Euphrates river, will that make you strong? No! So what help will you get from Egypt?
korean_text: 네가 시홀의 물을 마시려고 애굽으로 가는 길에 있음은 어찌 됨이며 또 네가 그 강물을 마시려고 앗수르로 가는 길에 있음은 어찌 됨이냐

sentences.original_text: So what help will you get from Egypt?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 당신이 이집트에서 어떤 도움을 얻겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: If you drink water from the Nile river,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 나일 강에서 물을 마신다면,

sentences.original_text: will that make you strong?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 당신을 강하게 만들겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: No!
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요!

sentences.original_text: And what help will you get from Assyria?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 앗시리아에서 어떤 도움을 얻겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: If you drink water from the Euphrates river,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 유프라테스 강에서 물을 마신다면,

sentences.original_text: will that make you strong?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 당신을 강하게 만들겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: No!
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요!
